items.sentence: This is the first time I\'ve ever been to Boston.
I couldn\'t think of anything appropriate to say.
You still have to fill out this application form.
Did you really plan to do that all by yourselves?
I think I\'ll ask Tom to help us weed the garden.
It\'s been a long time since I\'ve spoken French.
Tom and Mary first met at a restaurant in Boston.
Tom and Mary had lunch together in the cafeteria.
Is that the real reason that you don\'t like Tom?
I wonder if Tom really knows how to speak French.
